title: FS: Several N172 Old Judge HOFers - Only Billy Hamilton Left - PRICE DROP!
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: FS: Several N172 Old Judge HOFers - Only Billy Hamilton Left - PRICE DROP!
posts.post_content:
Up for sale are the following four OJ HOFers:

Billy Hamilton - 1889 - SGC 60 -- [S]$2,500[/S] $2,250
Amos Rusie - 1889 - SGC A -- $SOLD
Hugh Duffy - 1888 - PSA 2 -- $SOLD
Hank O'Day - 1887 - VG -- $SOLD

Paypal f/f preferred.  I'll cover shipping.  Back scans are available upon request.  

Prefer communication via email at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url].  My PM box is getting close to the limit (yet again).

Thanks for looking.  Derek

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/hofrookies1/websize/1889%20Hamilton.jpg[/IMG]
Derek--I'll take the O'Day. Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]

Dang it, Derek . . . How did I miss that O'Day?

I guess I'll take the Duffy :)

I'll shoot you an email.

Scott

bump!

Only one remaining is Billy Hamilton, graded SGC 60 (EX).  The price has been dropped by 10%.

killer card!!!
